kwargs.pattern: A string representing the regex pattern that the response should match.

kwargs.min_value: An integer representing the minimum value of the range.
kwargs.max_value: An integer representing the maximum value of the range.

kwargs.start_text: A string representing the text that the response should start with.
kwargs.end_text: A string representing the text that the response should end with.

kwargs.date_format: A string representing the date format (default is 'YYYY-MM-DD').
